welcome.title: Welcome to Universo Platformo!
welcome.intro: Saluton, hello! My name is Vladimir Levadnij, I am the General Diverseworker at the Teknokomo International Community. Let me introduce myself.
welcome.description1: You are entering an infinite space of exploration and collaboration with like-minded people. Here you can manage organizations, projects, and your own life.
welcome.description2: Our platform helps transform digital twins of enterprises and cities into reality. Together we are building bridges between worlds - virtual and real.
welcome.description3: In the next few steps, you will choose your global goals, personal interests, and platform features. This will help us personalize your experience and connect you with the right communities.

completion.title: Thank You for Joining Us!
completion.message1: Our platform administrators will review your selections and gradually provide you with the necessary functionality. Your journey has just begun!
completion.message2: Together we act for the common good of workers everywhere. Every world we explore, every project we complete, brings us closer to our great goals.
completion.noticeAlpha: The platform is in alpha version, so it may take weeks or even months to provide functionality to everyone, and there may be some glitches in the operation.
completion.noticeUpdates: We are not currently sending out platform update notifications, so you can follow the platform development yourself in our repositories on
